subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Basketball
Baseball
Hockey, Ice
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Twenty years later, revisit the most memorable moments from the sports summer of 1994, with archival photography and video recollections from Times reporters and editors on the Knicks, Rangers, World Cup and more.
